caption: Stopped here on a whim since I didn’t have time to pack my lunch before being called into work. The lemongrass beef sandwich and Thai iced tea made my day!

Banh Appetit has some of the BEST food in Maine. Their banh mi are phenomenal, I regularly drive 2 hours to buy a couple of lemongrass beef and shrimp banh mi. The bread is amazingly fresh, so are the crunchy veggies. It also doesn't matter what time of day it is, I always get a Vietnamese coffee! So rich and delicious! They also have a buffet  and a shop with items you can't find anywhere else.  Highly recommend it!

Truly outstanding! My fiance and I ordered two sandwiches to split (lemongrass beef and bbq pork) as well as a veggie spring roll. The portions were great, the price was very responsible for the size, and the flavour was GRAND.  I will definitely be coming back on my next trips through Portland to experience the rest of this menu.
10 bucks gets you a sandwich and a drink. Amazing deal in Portland
My favorite restaurant in Maine.
Great food , very nice owner
Best bahn mi sandwiches that we have found in Maine and the pho is delicious.
#1 spot in portland maine. This family knows how to cook! Banh mi heaven.

Every single thing I have tried here has been excellent. So grateful to have this superb gem in Portland! From the delicious food, to the wonderful service, to the awesome prices, Bahn Appetit should be everyone's go-to.
This is the most incredible Vietnamese food you will ever have.

Move over lobster roll, there's a new horizontal sandwich in town! We ordered the cold cut and lemongrass beef & shrimp banh mi and were blown away. From the crusty, flaky baguette to the crisp, crunchy, fresh dakion/carrot/cucumber to the slightly sweet and savory beef and shrimp, the meal was divine. What's more, we ordered late in the evening near the end of service and were so impressed with how fresh and carefully the banh mi were crafted, as well as what a great value they were considering the portion and quality. Cancel your dinner plans and check out Banh Appetit tonight!
The lemongrass beef banh mi is quite possibly the best sandwich in all of Portland. Seriously, it was love at first bite.
Fresh bread and incredible sandwiches. Try the lemongrass beef and shrimp
This place is so yummy and well priced. Get the bbq pork banhmi! It’s nice and tender, and they don’t skimp on the fillings.
We love their vermicelli bowls, especially the lemon grass beef and the pork filled egg roll. Very fresh tasting, nice savory dressing.

I can't add much to what others have said. My husband and I ordered two different banh mi. We loved the first half, traded, and loved the last half of the other. I wish I didn't live two hours away.... :(
Loooooooooooove this place. Food is amazing; easily the best Banh Mi I have ever had. I plan to continue going weekly for as long as I'm in Portland!
Fantastic food!! A must go
Delicious lemongrass beef sandwich.
I had dumplings, a lemongrass chicken bahn mi and a limeade. It was all highly satisfying. I can’t wait to go back and try the bbq pork.
Best Sandwich in Portland HANDS DOWN. Best Bahn Mi I've ever had

By far the best Bahn Mi in Maine and could very well be the best in all of New England! I have had the pleasure of trying every variety they have and can say they are all amazing! Nothing beats the original cold cut Bahn Mi but the Lemongrass Beef is simply delightful and I would reccomend to anyone who hasn't tried it before. Their appetizers are awesome as well and I think everyone needs to try a Vietnamese Iced coffee at least once in their lives. If you haven't had a chance to check this place out that needs to be at the top of your to do list, you are missing out!!!
Much better bahn mi than any I had living in Boston
Lets try something different

I lived in New Orleans and know an incredible banh mi when u have one and this place is no joke one of the best I think in the country. The meat is juicy and delicious, the bread is fluffy and it all comes together like a symphony. The value is unmatched as well. Love this place
Authentic Vietnamese food and lovely service. The reasonable price and the fully portion. Highly recommended. Yummy! Ngon!
Awesome Pho!
Tried the BBQ pork bánh mì and was completely blown away. Every part was delicious.
When I saw that this place had 5.0 stars, I was skeptical. And then I tried the food. It was *amazing*. I can genuinely say that Banh Appetit deserves every single one of those stars
Excellent food, at a great price.
Great banh mi, great service. Love this place.
This place is the closest thing we found to authentic Vietnamese food, having been to Vietnam in January!

This was way better than I ever could have expected!!!! I’ve never tried this kind of food and I’m so glad I did. The woman who sold it to me was so kind. I got the bbq banh mi sandwich and it spicy, sweet, tangy. Absolutely to die for. Will b back
Super hreat Banh Mi! I've spent time in Vietnam and it's been difficult finding the bread for Banh Mi like in Vietnam...this was near spot on. The fillings were very tasty! I'll be back for more!
Best Banh Mi In Portland Hands Down

Really fantastic Banh Mi’s. Spending time here from NYC, the first thing we noticed is the value — which is incredible here. Excellent quality and made to order, super pleased and satisfied. Thank you Banh Appetit, it was a great lunch!

Best banh mi I've ever had. I'm still thinking about my BBQ pork banh mi one week later because it was THAT GOOD. Crispy bread toasted warm, full of pork, and drizzled with sweet chili sauce. Really reasonably priced, and the staff are super sweet. They do curbside contactless pick-up too!
Amazing Tofu Bahn Mi
Very good banh mis. Only knock is that they are just a bit sluggish.
They have a vegan bahn mi that was really good!  Fast and delicious!
I can't speak for the rest of the menu but the banh mi are unbelievably delicious. I just keep getting those so don't try other things. And the staff are super nice. Best to call in your order ahead.

Best banh mi in Maine hands down! Drove all the way from Waterville to check them out and was definitely worth it!! Will be coming back real soon! Huge portions and really good prices! Also the sandwiches are also beautiful too made with love. Forgot to take a picture because food was devoured...

God damn, these bahn mi are good. Friendly service at a family run restaurant. Zero complaints. Everything is delicious and satisfying. BBQ pork bahn mi is Vietnamese style with big strips of boneless spare rib in the most perfect sauce.
Amazing! Had the tofu and lemongrass beef. Generous servings, flavorful, and fresh!
Delicious Banh Mi!
Amazing food & affordable. Light, fresh ingredients. Delicious. 10/10
The food is DELICIOUS! We ordered bbq pork bahn mi, pork egg rolls, wings, and tofu spring rolls. All items were top notch. We will be back for more.
Amazing authentic food, always fresh and delicious!

This place is an absolute gem. We found it just by doing a food near me search when we were driving through Portland. We ordered two bahn-mi and went to a park to eat them. They were so good we called back and ordered two more to take home and I ended up eating a second in the car. Mind blowingly good. We stop every time we go though portland now.
I've been looking for a good Bahn Mi place since moving to the area. Well I found it, great fresh food at a decent price and friendly service, here at Bahn Appetit. Thank you!
Loved the tofu banh mi and vegetable pho was delicious!

I have ordered from here three times since the quarantine began and tried a new bahn mi every time. Every single one has been amazing. Delicious, filling, inexpensive but very high quality. I can't wait to try some of their other offerings, but for a quick lunch, the bahn mi can't be beat.
The bbq pork banh mi is amazing!
Very high quality yummies
Hands down the best OG Pho in town.
Bang for your buck - one of the best deals around. Must try one of the quick, delicious bahn mi sandwiches, and they're only $6!!! Highly recommended!
This place is the banh! The banh mi sandwiches are filling, delicious and cheap! Even better that it is a small local restaurant with friendly staff! It is always a top pick for a quick lunch.
Super delicious bahn mi!

Very tasty and inexpensive (which is rare on the peninsula). There are also several great vegetarian options,  including the tofu bahn mi (delicious!!!), tofu spring rolls, and vegetarian pho. I'll be going there often!
The quick lunch options are great!
Food is fresh and the flavors are excellent.  Very reasonably priced.  Have eaten bahn mi, bao, crab rangoon, dumplings, and pho.  All are delicious.

Portland has a lot of good Vietnamese food. It's hard to stand out in this market. Bahn Appetit's food really stands out. The broth for their pho is home made and incredible. The meats and sauce and bread in their bahn mi are special and delicious. Their steam buns and pastry pockets are well priced and very high quality.  I would put their food against any other Vietnamese restaurant in town! Try it.
Love this place! Great food, awesome prices, friendly service. 👍
Solid pho, good pastry/buns. Going back to try more!
Great food at a fair price. There is seating for 4 near a window, but most traffic appears to be take out. I've been several times and they haven't missed yet.

Just stopped by for a Banh Mi.  Selected the lemongrass chicken Banh Mi, and I also ordered two spring rolls as a delicious way to eat my vegetables at dinner tonight.  The Banh Mi was EXCELLENT!  I was planning to eat it at home (in Freeport), but I took a bite and proceeded to eat it all in the car on my drive home.  My warning to all of you - do not take a bite of the Banh Mi on the way home if you want to scrupulously avoid all manner of distracted (and potentially messy) driving!
This is where the old Huong’s went. Best pho in Portland.
Ah, this place is great! The sandwiches are well-priced and delicious, the smaller bites are just the same, and the kitties that wave their paws at you are very cute. I swing by here all the time!

This place is Legit. Great Name, great people & amazing Vietnamese Sandwiches. Also with all the busy construction & tourists down in the Old Port we spend so much time just getting into a restuarant and also have to deal with parking, Banh Appetit is right on outside edge of downtown Portland on Cumberland Ave & is very Convenient for an In & out Lunch with high quality authentic Vietnamese Cuisine.  5***** allday. cảm ơn
I've tried 4 bahn mi's so far, and they're all fantastic!  They're quite large and priced more affordably than most other sandwich places in Portland.

I honestly think Banh Appetit can lay claim to best banh mi in the Portland area after trying all the other shops that highlight the sandwich. Warm, soft, and slightly flaky bread with a perfect mix of pickled veggie and meats, pate, and that magical mayonnaise like spread. I have gone several times and tried the same and different versions/ a special banh mi and are consistently magical. Though the ala cart specials always look delicious online, have yet to try as I am not usually around midday. Always friendly service from the owner and value is crazy amazing for the quality offered. Run don’t walk if ever in the area.

Great value, great quality. The food is fresh and the flavors are delicious. Their nuoc mam reminds me of my grandma's and I can't say much better than that when it comes to Vietnamese food. Consider calling in your order ahead if you're in a rush, but even if you have to wait there's a great selection of Asian groceries to check out.
The service was prompt and the food was excellent. The BBQ Pork Banh Mi had by far the best quality of meat on it, of any other places I've tried. Quality food for a suberb price. High recommend!
Incredible food at a very fair price. Wicked nice folks. I'll be back to try the whole menu!
I would go here everyday if I could
Excellent. That is all.

This bahn mi, Viet food shop is the BEST! This is a definite find and we are so fortunate to have them in the neighborhood. This is a testament to entrepreneurial spirit. The family is wonderful... the mom who cooked and owned Huongs on St Johns St..., is now cooking at this location and this is so good for us lovers of Vietnamese cuisine.  She sold the restaurant recently and is now working with her daughter Snow. Therefore, we are going to get treated to her marvelous food!  The variety of bahn mi are delicious, the cold cut bahn mi even has house made pate. My favorite is the grilled pork bahn mi, with fresh and crunchy veggies... the bahn mi rolls are crispy and delectable... great for a quick lunch and accompanied with a Thai Iced Tea or iced Viet coffee is perfection.  The shrimp summer rolls (2) are tasty and go well as a starter. The steamed buns stuffed with pork and a quail egg are satisfyingly delicious.  The other daughter Tran has the Pho Shop upstairs at the Monument Sq Market... yummy food and friendly employees.  I admire their hard work and dedication to their customers...and me, being their #1 fan..., wish them all the best for future success. It's also OK to let them know that Steve sent you... I'm happy to know them and promote the business 😍🍜🍣🍱

This banh mi is great. I had the bbq pork it was a good mix of vegetables and meat and I’m happy to see jalapeños for the heat. The banh mi was bit bigger and a bit pricier than I’m used to but I think it was a good value on the peninsula. I’ll be back to eat more

Amazing Bahn Mi! I’ve been working in Portland on a long project, here for 4 months and have tried lots of restaurants. This place opened June2019 and I didn’t find it until last week. I wish I had know about it sooner! If you want some great Vietnamese food, this is your place. I have to go back this week at least twice more before going home to try more of their dishes. Try parking down the street on Mayo Dr if you’re having trouble finding a spot.
